citation: Mineral Resources Development (Application of Act) Order 2004 (Tas)
text:
Mineral Resources Development (Application of Act) Order 2004

I make, with the agreement of the Minister for Environment and Planning, the following order under section 5(3) of the Mineral Resources Development Act 1995 .

26 May 2004

BRYAN GREEN

Minister for Infrastructure, Energy and Resources

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Mineral Resources Development (Application of Act) Order 2004 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Act applies to certain land
    The Mineral Resources Development Act 1995 is declared to apply to â€“
            (a) the land specified in Part 1 of Schedule 1 to this order; and
            (b) the land specified in Part 2 of Schedule 1 to this order.

SCHEDULE 1 - Areas of land

Clause 3

PART 1 - Plan 6306

All that area of land comprising about 43.16 hectares bounded by a heavy black line on Plan 6306 in the Central Plan Register, a reduced copy of which is set out, by way of illustration only, in Part 1 of Schedule 2 to this order.

PART 2 - Plan 6305

All that area of land comprising about 1.21 hectares bounded by heavy black lines on Plan 6305 in the Central Plan Register, a reduced copy of which is set out, by way of illustration only, in Part 2 of Schedule 2 to this order.

SCHEDULE 2 - Plans

PART 1 - Plan 6306

PART 2 - Plan 6305

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 2 June 2004

This order is administered in the Department of Infrastructure, Energy and Resources.
